name: Weather Clock
description:
You play a little guy who can change the clock as much as he wants.

While progressing to the level, you'll see some signs that will give the player information about a hour+minute combination that will invoke a certain weather.

Use the weather to pass through the level.

No asset used, all by ourselves.

Game made with the theme: Master of Time.

Team 5,

ODOR Thibault, SERRANO Léa, SERRANO Alexis & NGUYEN Thi-Christine.
